alert.note: Alert for Giles; Lawrence; Marshall; Maury; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 29 at 11:14PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Giles, Lawrence, Marshall, Maury and Wayne. * WHEN...Until 215 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1114 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewisburg, Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Loretto, Collinwood, Summertown, Cornersville, St. Joseph, Ethridge, Lynnville, Leoma, Henryville, Goodspring, Westpoint, Iron City, Culleoka, Cypress Inn, Belfast and Lutts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
